data.text:
@johnlundin We need to keep re upping this. Don't let this story get sidelined. NYT team says they're not done yet. 
https://t.co/CVPB0RKI3C
@johnlundin NYTimes has since reprinted it as even something that shattering gets lost in the current days noise. 'Look up, the roof is gone'.

@johnlundin His supporters don't care, in fact, they like that he got rich, supposedly 'using the laws available' bankruptcy, suing contractors he didn't like, etc. They thought he'd take his 'tactics' to the gov. and help them in so doing.  What they didn't realize is rich folk only help #1
